reviewText: My children watched these when they were young.  They are wholesome and fun.  I wish someone would put them on DVD!

My daughter is now almost 14 years old and to this day I still remember her watching ALL of the Gerbert VHS movies....these movies are sooooo cute....I just wish so much that I could find them now on DVD for my son and daughter-in-law who are expecting their 1st child.....
